text: Forrest Hood "Fob" James, Jr. (born September 15, 1934), is an American politician, and civil engineer. He served two terms as the 48th Governor of Alabama, from 1979 to 1983 as a Democrat, and again from 1995 to 1999 as a Republican. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Engineers from Alabama Category:American football players Category:Episcopalians Category:Governors of Alabama Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Fob James
